Treatment is symptomatic and supportive, and may include physical and speech therapy and educational services.",NINDS,Coffin Lowry Syndrome
What is the outlook for Coffin Lowry Syndrome ?,The prognosis for individuals with Coffin-Lowry syndrome varies depending on the severity of symptoms. Early intervention may improve the outlook for patients. Life span is reduced in some individuals with Coffin-Lowry syndrome.,NINDS,Coffin Lowry Syndrome
